verses.text:
The \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d* \add is\add* upon me; because the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* me to preach good \w tidings|strong="H1319"\w* unto the \w meek|strong="H6035"\w*; he hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to bind \w up|strong="H2280"\w* the \w brokenhearted|strong="H7665"\w*, to \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \w liberty|strong="H1865"\w* to the \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*, and the opening of the \w prison|strong="H6495"\w* to \add them that are\add* \w bound|strong="H0631"\w*;

To \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* the \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of \w vengeance|strong="H5359"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; to \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* all that \w mourn|strong="H0057"\w*;

To \w appoint|strong="H7760"\w* unto them that \w mourn|strong="H0057"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto them \w beauty|strong="H6287"\w* for \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*, the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* of \w joy|strong="H8342"\w* for \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w*, the \w garment|strong="H4594"\w* of \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* for the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w heaviness|strong="H3544"\w*; that they might be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w trees|strong="H0352"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, the \w planting|strong="H4302"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that he might be \w glorified|strong="H6286"\w*.

¶ And they shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w old|strong="H5769"\w* \w wastes|strong="H2723"\w*, they shall raise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* the \w former|strong="H7223"\w* \w desolations|strong="H8074"\w*, and they shall \w repair|strong="H2318"\w* the \w waste|strong="H2721"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, the \w desolations|strong="H8074"\w* of \w many|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

And \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* and \w feed|strong="H7462"\w* your \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w alien|strong="H5236"\w* \add shall be\add* your \w plowmen|strong="H0406"\w* and your \w vinedressers|strong="H3755"\w*.

But ye shall be \w named|strong="H7121"\w* the \w Priests|strong="H3548"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: \add men\add* shall \w call|strong="H0559"\w* you the \w Ministers|strong="H8334"\w* of our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: ye shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w riches|strong="H2428"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, and in their \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* shall ye \w boast|strong="H3235"\w* yourselves.

¶ For your \w shame|strong="H1322"\w* \add ye shall have\add* \w double|strong="H4932"\w*; and \add for\add* \w confusion|strong="H3639"\w* they shall \w rejoice|strong="H7442"\w* in their \w portion|strong="H2506"\w*: therefore in their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* they shall \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w double|strong="H4932"\w*: \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* shall be unto them.

For I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w love|strong="H0157"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, I \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w robbery|strong="H1498"\w* for burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*; and I will \w direct|strong="H5414"\w* their \w work|strong="H6468"\w* in \w truth|strong="H0571"\w*, and I will \w make|strong="H3772"\w* an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with them.

And their \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* shall be \w known|strong="H3045"\w* among the \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*, and their \w offspring|strong="H6631"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: all that \w see|strong="H7200"\w* them shall \w acknowledge|strong="H5234"\w* them, that they \add are\add* the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \add which\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

I will \w greatly|strong="H7797"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* shall be \w joyful|strong="H1523"\w* in my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; for he hath \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* me with the \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* of \w salvation|strong="H3468"\w*, he hath \w covered|strong="H3271"\w* me with the \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*, as a \w bridegroom|strong="H2860"\w* \w decketh|strong="H3547"\w* \add himself\add* with \w ornaments|strong="H6287"\w*, and as a \w bride|strong="H3618"\w* \w adorneth|strong="H5710"\w* \add herself\add* with her \w jewels|strong="H3627"\w*.\f + \fr 61.10 \ft decketh: Heb. decketh as a priest\f*

For as the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* bringeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* her \w bud|strong="H6780"\w*, and as the \w garden|strong="H1593"\w* causeth the things that are \w sown|strong="H2221"\w* in it to spring \w forth|strong="H6779"\w*; so the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* will cause \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* and \w praise|strong="H8416"\w* to spring \w forth|strong="H6779"\w* before all the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.
